parameters.name: Collections
parameters.description: The collection where the model is located. You can specify multiple collections and separate them with commas (,).

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The domain. Only models in the domain are returned. Valid values: nlp (Natural Language Processing) and cv (Computer Vision).

parameters.name: Label
parameters.description: The label. Models whose label key or label value contains a specific label are filtered.

parameters.name: ModelName
parameters.description: The model name used to filter the returned models.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The order in which the entries are sorted by the specific field on the returned page. Default value: ASC.

*   ASC
*   DESC

parameters.name: Origin
parameters.description: The model source used to filter the models that belong to a community or organization, such as ModelScope and Hugging Face.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: Provider
parameters.description: The provider. If you configure this parameter, only the models exposed by the provider are returned. If you leave this parameter empty, only models owned by the user are returned.

parameters.name: Query
parameters.description: The query condition. For example, if you set the value to nlp, all models that match ModelName, Domain, Task, LabelKey, and LabelValue are returned.

parameters.name: SortBy
parameters.description: The field used to sort the results. The GmtCreateTime field is used for sorting.

parameters.name: Task
parameters.description: The task used to filter the models that belong to the task type. Example: text-classification.

parameters.name: WorkspaceId
parameters.description: The workspace ID. Only models in this workspace are queried. You can call [ListWorkspaces](~~449124~~) to obtain the workspace ID.
